full_title: OKS Roll-Type Cleaning Cloths, 30-Pack (35cm x 25cm), Pink & White Viscose Rayon Cloths for All Purpose Cleaner, Glass Cleaner, Bathroom Cleaner, and Floor Cleaning

reasoning.keyword_integration_strategy: Integrated the highest-volume relevant keywords ('all purpose cleaner', 'glass cleaner', 'bathroom cleaner', 'floor cleaning') by framing them as the cloths' intended uses. Used verified facts (pink & white color, roll-type, 30-count) to create a natural, descriptive flow.
